description:
7/15/2022 – at approximately 7:05 p.m. at the intersection of SE 53rd Avenue and SE Drake Street.
 Weather  was clear and the pavement surface was dry .  
 This crash involved a single vehicle  where serious i njuries  were  reported . 
 
 The d river was  traveling east bound on SE Drake at what witnesses stated as normal speed. The driver 
suddenly veered off the roadway, struck a parked vehicle and rolled over. Alcohol appeared to be a 
factor in this crash.  
 
The driver was cited  for reckless driving and DUI .  
 Staff did not visit the location .

8/4/2022 – at 8:19 a.m. at  the intersection of SE River Road and TV Hwy.
 
Weather was clear and the pavement surface was dry.  
 This crash involved a single motorcycle v ehicle crash which resulted in serious injuries.  
 The motorcyclist was traveling south on SE 13
th to continue onto River Road. The driver was observed 
exceeding the speed limit and hit the railroad  tracks too fast which resulted in the driver losing control 
of the vehicle and crashing.  
 The report does not indicate whether  the driver was cited . 
 Speeding behavior w as a factor  in this crash;  therefore,  Public Works staff did not visit the crash 
location.

7/18/2022 – at around 1:38 p.m. at a private driveway and NE Cornell Road.  
 
Weather  was clear and the pavement surface was dry  
 This crash involved a vehicle versus a bicyclist with no to minor injuries . 
 Bicyclist was travelling eastbound on the sidewalk and rode into a vehicle waiting to exit the driveway. 
Vehicle stopped to yield to pedestrians, when none were observed the driver pulled forward and hit 
the bicyclist.  
   
Staff visited the location and did not observe any vision obstructions, its unknown why the driver and 
bicyclist did not see each other prior to impact.  
 
The report does not indicate whether  the driver was cited.

7/21/2022 at around 2:20 p.m. at the intersection of NW Connell Avenue and NW Cory Street.  
 
Weather was clear and the pavement surface was dry  
 This crash involved a vehicle versus a bicyclist with minor injuries.  
  
 Bicyclist was travelling westbound On NW Connell Avenue. Bicyclist failed to remain stopped at the 
stop sign and impacted a vehicle  turning left on NW Connell from south bound Cory Street. The vehicle 
did not have a stop sign and has the right of way at the intersection.   
   
Staff did not visit the location.  
 The report does not indicate whether  the bicyclist was cited.

7/26/2022 at around 12:52 p.m. at the intersection of S E 9
th Avenue and SE Walnut Street .  
 
Weather was clear and the pavement surface was dry  
 
This crash involved a vehicle versus a scooter  with minor injuries.  
 Scooter  was travelling at a high speed, on the sidewalk southbound on SE 9
th Avenue. Scooter  failed to  
stop or l ook both ways before crossing the intersection. Vehicle failed to see the scooter before it 
entered the intersection. Driver did catch movement in time to turn vehicle sharply away from scooter to avoid a head on collision.        
Staff did not visit the location.  
 The report does not indicate whether  the bicyclist was cited.

8/30/2022 at around 3:04 p.m. at a private drive just on SE Cornelius Pass Road just south of SE Baseline Street.
 Weather was clear and the pavement surface was dry  
 This crash involved a vehicle versus a bicycle with no injuries.  
 
Bicyclist was travelling northbound on the sidewalk and  collided with a vehicle exiting right  out of the 
driveway. Bicyclist did note the driver checking for cross traffic  and assumed the driver saw her .   
   
Staff visited the location and did not observe any vision obstructions, its unknown why the driver did  
not see the bicyclist , and why the bicyclist (who could see the driver) did not stop prior to impact.
